title: Ep. 68 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description:
SPONSORS: - Get the new Bud Light Seltzer Lemonade delivered at https://BudLight.com/delivery - Get your first visit absolutely free at https://ForHims.com/bears - Get an extra three months of ExpressVPN for free at https://ExpressVPN.com/CAVE - Go to https://HelloFresh.com/cave10 and use code cave10 to get 10 free meals free plus free shipping! - Go to https://TommyJohn.com/BEARS to get 15% off your first order.

Bert Kreischer and Tom Segura discuss the differences between raising girls and boys, road rage, their 2 Bears, 1 Sapp Super Bowl live show, Lil Nas X, Fans Only creators, and Hilaria Baldwin's accent controversy. They also put out the call to find the girls Tom's toured Rome with.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
